name: @valkey/valkey-glide
description: General Language Independent Driver for the Enterprise (GLIDE) for Valkey

scripts.clean:build: rm -rf build-ts dist/*/target rust-client/target rust-client/glide-rs.*.node src/glide-rs.*.node build/*.tsbuildinfo
scripts.clean: rm -rf build-ts dist/*/target node_modules rust-client/node_modules */node_modules rust-client/target glide-logs rust-client/glide-rs.*.node src/glide-rs.*.node rust-client/index.* src/ProtobufMessage.* *.tsbuildinfo test-report*.html yarn.lock package-lock.json rust-client/package-lock.json rust-client/Cargo.lock
scripts.build:flow: npm run prereq && npm run build-protobuf && npm run build:rust-client && npm run build:ts
scripts.build-protobuf: mkdir -p build-ts && pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs --no-verify --no-convert -o build-ts/ProtobufMessage.js ../glide-core/src/protobuf/*.proto && pbts -o build-ts/ProtobufMessage.d.ts build-ts/ProtobufMessage.js && replace 'this\.encode\(message, writer\)\.ldelim' 'this.encode(message, writer && writer.len ? writer.fork() : writer).ldelim' build-ts/ProtobufMessage.js
scripts.test:local: npm run build-test-utils && jest --verbose --testPathIgnorePatterns='Validation of Exported Symbols' --testPathIgnorePatterns='ServerModules'
scripts.build-test-utils: cd ../utils && npm i && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run install-linting && eslint -c ../eslint.config.mjs && npm run prettier:check
scripts.lint:fix: npm run install-linting && eslint -c ../eslint.config.mjs --fix && npm run prettier:format
scripts.prepublishOnly: cd rust-client && npm run prepublishOnly && cd .. && npm run build:release

author: Valkey GLIDE Maintainers
